author: Reuters
title: Boeing to offer voluntary layoffs to employees to tide over coronavirus fallout
description: Boeing is set to offer buyout and early retirement packages to employees, CNBC confirmed on Thursday, in a bid to mitigate the financial fallout from the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Boeing is set to offer buyout and early retirement packages to employees, two people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday, in a bid to mitigate the financial fallout from the coronavirus pandemic. CNBC has confirmed the report.
Boeing was initiating a … [+1680 chars]
